headline: 1 Restaurant Stock with Exciting Potential and 2 to Turn Down
summary: Restaurants increase convenience and give many people a place to unwind. But it’s not all sunshine and rainbows as they’re notoriously hard to run thanks to perishable ingredients, labor shortages, or volatile consumer spending. Unfortunately, these factors have spelled trouble for the industry as it has shed 4% over the past six months. This performance was worse than the S&P 500’s 1.6% decline.
